#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    
    int n,m,q,x1,x2,y1,y2;
    long long sum;
    cin >> n >> m;
    int a[n+2][m+2];
    for(int i = 1;i <= n;i++) {
        for(int j = 1;j <= m;j++) {
        cin >> a[i][j];
        }
    }
    cin >> q;
    while(q--){
        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
        sum = 0;
        for(int i = x1;i <= x2;i++){
            for(int j = y1;j <= y2;j++){
                sum += a[i][j];
            }
        }
        cout << sum << endl;
        
    }
    return 0;
}
